long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sizing problems while shopping online for clothes are over! All of your measurements will be saved in this extension to help you find the right size during your next purchase!

Bespoke takes its users measurements in a single photo to improve the consumer's experience while shopping online for clothes. It finds the right size for every purchase. Bespoke is available in the form of a mobile application and a Google Chrome extension. The app is used to take the measurements. Using apple's ARkit, it precisely calculates the measurements necessary for clothes sizing in a fraction of a second. Instantly, the data created with the app is transferred into the Chrome extension. This way, it is easy to compare a person's measurements to a clothing item on a website.

Our goal is to offer consumers the best experience possible while shopping online for clothes. In order to achieve this, we are looking for clothing brand partnerships to offer the easiest and the most accurate sizing recommendations.
